title: Vital Gaming Team 1 LF Serious Top Lane or Jungle
body: Practise almost every night and looking to play tournaments next season we use ts3 for comms

replies.body:
Hey i am interested in a quality team to partake in in the up coming season which is striving to win games and constantly improve. Hopefully reaching high levels.
IGN: qwertilian   D5
Jungle main, like to play Elise... a lot, but can jungle well on numerous champs, eve, shaco, lee, grag

Just saw the post am quite keen to play some ranked 5s. I pretty much play it for the competitive aspect of the game really dont care to much about the whole "fun" side of it. Currently in Plat 4 only played <100 ranked solo this season so if i grinded could get high plat probably. Also run a ranked 5s team with some mates thats in Gold2 team consists and has consisted of diamond tier and been playing some norms with couple challengers to learn the game better. Let me know i do shift work but normally always available at night time. 

Of course i got Skype, Ts3. 

Normally play the shotcaller in my team but happy not to do so.

I would also be keen to play the top lane role for your team, i have been in a few ranked teams last season of which we did very well and i played efficiently as a top lane. I main top and can be flexible with my picks (Carry, tank etc) I play pretty much everyday and do believe i have what it takes to be fully committed to this team in a professional manner.

i would gladly be a serious top lane for this team and play pretty much everyday. my other acc was banned last season unfortunately so right now i am on my smurf which is only bronze 1 which i hope this does not matter.
